M

main - package main
 
Main - Class in main
A starter class for the ConverterProject application.
Main() - Constructor for class main.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.Main
Starts the application.
MenuBar - Class in view
The menu bar at the top of the screen in the ConverterProject application.
MenuBar(ActionListener) - Constructor for class view.MenuBar
Creates a new MenuBar.
MenubarListener - Class in controller
A listener for the ConverterProject application's menu bar.
MenubarListener(ConversionPanel, ValueToConvert) - Constructor for class controller.MenubarListener
Creates a MenubarListener for the given ConversionPanel, which acts as the app's controller.
metresConversionArea - Variable in class view.ConversionPanel
 
MetresConversionArea - Class in view
The conversion area for metres in the ConverterProject application.
MetresConversionArea() - Constructor for class view.MetresConversionArea
Creates a new MetresConversionArea with an orange background and uneditable text.
model - package model
 
model - Variable in class controller.MenubarListener
